review: It was a good experience.  I liked the way she made me feel comfortable and ensured I get the right results for my health issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been married for 7 years and did not conceive even once in these years. I consulted a Fertility centre Milan in JP nagar which gave us no results inspite of visiting for 3 long years. I was completely broke down mentally, physically and financially.. However, as a last hope we consulted  Dr Shwetha referred by one of our friends. I feel emotional and excited today as I am writing this review about Dr Shwetha , I felt confident in the first visit itself, each appointment was worth the visit and lead us to our dream of having a baby. Yes! I’m pregnant now, in such a short span it’s only 6 months I have been consulting.. Dr Shwetha has given me the most precious gift in my life, we are so fortunate to have connected with you Dr, you are much more than I ever  would have thought could find in a doctor, thank you for your medical, mental emotional, motivation, positive attitude  and spiritual support, you have made such a big difference in my  life I’m grateful to you. Any one trying to conceive and lost hope, trust me never lose your hope as you will never regret your decision of meeting Dr Shwetha. Its Blessings.I would also like to include about the staff members who are very supportive, friendly and always cooperative. A big Thank you to Dr Shwetha and all the staff members. :)

I am writing to share my recent experience at Janisthaa Fertility Clinic, specifically with Dr. Shwetha and her staff. Unfortunately, my last visit Saturday was highly disappointing, as I found the approach of both the staff and the doctor to be severely lacking in customer-centricity and transparency.

Upon arrival, my wife and I were directed to a consultant downstairs, where we provided all relevant information about our situation. Subsequently, we were sent to Dr. Shwetha, who spent a mere minute discussing our concerns before referring us to her assistant for further assistance.

However, my dissatisfaction escalated when it came time for billing. Without consulting anyone else, the receptionist demanded a payment of 5000 rupees and handed us a bill labeled as an "unwanted kit" for the same amount. When I requested a breakdown of the charges, I was astonished to see various fees listed, including 600 rupees for the consultant, 500 rupees for scanning, 390 rupees for another consultant, and a staggering 3510 rupees for "written doctor names." When I questioned this, I was told it was a government fee, which seemed dubious at best.

Feeling misled and frustrated, * ******** **** **** * ** ** *** ****** ****** ** ****** * **** ************ *********** However, upon further discussion with Dr. Shwetha herself, I received no satisfactory explanation or resolution. Instead, all medications and prescriptions were abruptly taken back, and my wife and I were asked to leave.

It is deeply concerning that such practices are allowed to persist in a medical establishment. Patients have the right to transparent and fair billing practices, as well as respectful treatment from healthcare professionals. My experience has left me questioning the integrity and ethics of Janisthaa Fertility Clinic and its staff.*** **** ******* ****** ** ******** *** ******** **** *** ****** *** * ******* *** ****** ** ******* ** ***** ********* *** ******** *** ****** ** ***** ********* No one should be subjected to such treatment, regardless of their financial status.
It was a good experience.  I liked the way she made me feel comfortable and ensured I get the right results for my health issue.

The doctor was very professional but I felt like she was in a hurry. She didn't even gave me proper 5 mins for consultation. The pregnancy test came negative. She told me to get a thyroid test done. It came fine. But, obviously I was expecting her to advice me on why am I feeling this way, weakness, dizziness and spotting when she had already adviced me to get the test done in the first place. I didn't get satisfactory answers from her. Better, I could have just waited another few days for urine pregnancy test at home and researched the internet for my other problems.

We all know how important motherhood is in every women’s life, and i got success in first attempt only because of Dr.Shwetha mam she is the best doctor and she explains everything clearly about the process, their team is highly professional and knowledgeable. They made me feel comfortable throughout my journey and sister Rajeshwari madam *** ** *** **** ** ****** *** **** ** **** ******** *** she is very friendly .thankyou everyone entire team and Dr.Shwetha mam ‘she is a form of god’. ❤️

review: Our doctor Shwetha  mam is realy wonderful treatment with caring with us and we r very much suffer in our life but God has show way to Shwetha mam clinic and she is like a light in our life ***** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ***** so plz visit once and u will realize what she is!!!.Thank u so much mam ....Am Asma Zulfi from Hassan.....

Doctor was in a hurry, didn't explain anything about an issue and neither listened to me. I was explaining something, doctor ******* ********* *** stopped me and took next patient's file. Doctor doesn't specifically mention when we have to re-visit. Not everyone is well aware about the issue, doctor should spend little time and explain.
reply_text: So sorry about the experience. Usually Saturday’s are very busy. This centre is tertiary centre for fertility issues mainly.

review: I had visited doctor a year ago she is the one who gave me confidence to proceed with pregnancy as I had unknown diabetes were all doctors said me to abort with her confidence I continued my treatment for 5months there then shifted to near by hospital as my residence is very far from hospital. now happily having a boy baby if six months.thanks a lot mam you are a god to me.
She is amazing treating any gynic concerns. *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** *********. I recommend many of my friends and family to her.
